text.name: toolTip_trickleUsage_seedScale
text.text: Set the usage rate for all Seeders & Planters, where 100% is the game default.

text.name: toolTip_trickleUsage_sprayScale
text.text: Set the usage rate for all Sprayers & Spreaders, where 100% is the game default. This affects everything in the following categories: Crop Protection, Slurry Tanks, Sprayers, Fertilizer Spreaders & Manure Spreaders.
